title: 十面埋伏
info: Game made for DESKTOP(prefered resolution 1920x1080). Also you need a keyboard to be able to play.. I made this in collaboration with a friend who is currently in Sky-music studying to become a sound technician. He provides the sounds and i provide the code.

title: MyPage
info: One of the first iterations of my personal page. I just want a reminder to how it all started

title: Battle Realms
info: Tribute page to one of my top two childhood video games.

title: NotTinder
info: Work still in progress.. In the end I am hoping to make a web app that is similar to Tinder, but it just isn't Tinder, more like Not Tinder. In this project I am also working with some of my friends who actually came up with the idea.
